name: Mysterious Farm
description:
Mysterious Farm is a out of control farm game, you have to get the cabbages picked up as quick as possible and put them one by one in the silo. If you get too many rotten cabbages you lose! 

Rotten plants need to be put in the bin, and healthy cabbages need to be sold in the silo for points!

WASD to move, E to pick and drop in silo or bin.

Disclaimer: This was the second game we created during the game jam, but atleast it works. Our first idea flopped at Saturday 11pm. :p
